requirements.description: Sentry collects data only if you configure it to send data to Sentry.
This data typically includes software bugs (Errors), API calls, page loads, or similar requests and responses from your apps (Transactions).
By default, data collected by Sentry does not include any personally identifiable information (PII).

type.summary: Default Data Collection Exclusion of PII

requirements.description: You can send additional context and metadata to Sentry, including user names, email addresses, or by attaching files such as logs or crash reports.
Sentry processes data only if you send data to provide application monitoring services.
You must disclose and/or include in your app privacy policy all types of data collected through your app, including data sent to Sentry.
